skills.name: dark blessing
skills.wear_off: You are no longer aligned with the dark gods.

skills.name: flame shield
skills.wear_off: The flames surrounding you die away.

skills.name: force shield
skills.wear_off: The shield about you fades away.

skills.name: shockshield
skills.wear_off: The static around you grounds out.

skills.name: calm
skills.wear_off: You have lost your peace of mind.

skills.name: detect evil
skills.wear_off: The red in your vision disappears.

skills.name: detect good
skills.wear_off: The gold in your vision disappears.

skills.name: detect hidden
skills.wear_off: You feel less aware of your surroundings.

skills.name: detect invis
skills.wear_off: You no longer see invisible objects.

skills.name: faerie fire
skills.wear_off: The pink aura around you fades away.

skills.name: fly
skills.wear_off: You slowly float to the ground.

skills.name: infravision
skills.wear_off: You no longer see in the dark.

skills.name: sanctuary
skills.wear_off: The white aura around your body fades.

skills.name: group sanctuary
skills.wear_off: The white aura around your body fades.

skills.name: divine protection
skills.wear_off: You are no longer protected by the gods.

skills.name: shield
skills.wear_off: Your force shield shimmers then fades away.

skills.name: shadow shield
skills.wear_off: The shadow about your body fades away.

skills.name: sturning
skills.wear_off: You are no longer surrounded by a magical shield.

skills.name: mystic armor
skills.wear_off: You feel somewhat vulnerable as your mystic armor fades out of existance.

skills.name: resilience
skills.wear_off: Your no longer resist draining attacks.

skills.name: berserk
skills.wear_off: You feel your pulse slow down.

skills.name: warcry
skills.wear_off: Your battle rage slowly fades away.

skills.name: bloodlust
skills.wear_off: Your lust for blood fades away.

skills.name: dirt kicking
skills.wear_off: You rub the dirt out of your eyes.

skills.name: Shield of darkness
skills.wear_off: Your dark aura fades in the light.
